text: Suleiman Abba (born 22 March 1959) is a retired Nigerian police officer who served as the 17th Inspector General of Nigerian Police. == Education == Abba holds bachelor's degree of art (B.A degree in history) from University of Jos. == Career == He began his career with Nigerian police and rose through ranks to become AIG. Held numerous positions such as Commissioner of Police in Lagos and Rivers States, Assistant Inspector-General of Police in charge of Zone 7 Abuja and Aide-De-Camp (ADC) to Maryam Abacha. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Police officers Category:Nigerian people Category:Jigawa State
title: Suleiman Abba
